parse.title: List of most-streamed artists on Spotify

text.*:
As of 21 September 2018, No. 1 is Drake, with 55 million monthly listeners.

Contents

  • 1 Monthly
  • 2 On the Spotify Global Top 200
  • 3 All-time
  • 4 Most followers
  • 5 Peak position on chart
  • 6 Most streamed artists by year
    • 6.1 2017
    • 6.2 2016
    • 6.3 2015
    • 6.4 2014
    • 6.5 2013
  • 7 See also
  • 8 References

On the Spotify Global Top 200[edit]

This list enumerates the streams artists' song accrued on the Spotify Global Top 200, which is less than the artist's total streams.[20]

All-time[edit]

This list enumerates the number of streams artists' albums (LP & EP) have accrued on Spotify.

Rank Artist Total streams

(billions)

1. Justin Bieber 11  CAN
As of July 27, 2018

Most followers[edit]

It has been suggested that this section be split out into another article titled List of most followed artists on Spotify. (Discuss) (July 2018)
No. 2 is Rihanna with over 25 million followers.
No. 4 is Justin Bieber with over 23 million followers.
  Also among the 30 most streamed artists monthly

Most streamed artists by year[edit]

Macklemore & Ryan Lewis were the most streamed artists of 2013.

2017[edit]

Spotify's most streamed artist of 2017 was Ed Sheeran with 6.3 billion streams that year. This was his second year topping the list.[51]

Rank Chg Artist Country
1. Ed Sheeran  GBR
2. Drake  CAN
3. The Weeknd
4. Kendrick Lamar  USA
5. The Chainsmokers

2016[edit]

Spotify's most streamed artist of 2016 was Drake with 4.7 billion streams that year. He topped the list for a second year in a row.[52]

Rank Chg Artist Country
1. Drake  CAN
2. Justin Bieber
3. Rihanna  BAR
4. Twenty One Pilots  USA
5. Kanye West

2015[edit]

Spotify's most streamed artist of 2015 was Drake with 1.8 billion streams that year.[53]

Rank Chg Artist Country
1. Drake  CAN
2. Ed Sheeran  GBR
3. The Weeknd  CAN
4. Maroon 5  USA
5. Kanye West

2014[edit]

Spotify's most streamed artist of 2014 was Ed Sheeran with 860 million streams that year.[54]

Rank Chg Artist Country
1. Ed Sheeran  GBR
2. Eminem  USA
3. Coldplay  GBR
4. Calvin Harris
5. Katy Perry  USA

2013[edit]

Spotify's most streamed artists of 2013 were Macklemore & Ryan Lewis.[55]

Rank Artist Country
1. Macklemore & Ryan Lewis  USA
2. Avicii  SWE
3. Daft Punk  FRA
4. Eminem  USA
5. Imagine Dragons
6. Jay-Z
7. Bruno Mars
8. Rihanna  BAR
9. Calvin Harris  GBR
10. Drake  CAN
